pageContent: Objective: To review the development, methodology and difficulties of evaluating the quality of life (QoL) in patients with hormone-resistant prostate cancer, and to analyse the subjective effect of palliative radiotherapy among these patients.

metaData.source:
Association of functional status and treatment choice among older men with prostate cancer in the Medicare Advantage population
